abstract: Many big-name companies are reporting earnings, including Apple, Exxon Mobil, Facebook, General Motors and Chrysler, and the Fed is expected to keep up its stimulus efforts.
snippet: Many big-name companies are reporting earnings, including Apple, Exxon Mobil, Facebook, General Motors and Chrysler, and the Fed is expected to keep up its stimulus efforts.
lead_paragraph: APPLE EARNINGS Apple has become one of the most valuable companies in the world largely because of the success of iPhones and iPads. But over the last year, the growth of its profit has slowed as fewer people have been upgrading their smartphones each year, and as more competitors have produced low-cost tablets. In response, Apple in September introduced not one, but two new iPhones. When the company announces its third-quarter earnings on Monday, investors and analysts will watch closely to determine whether the new iPhones have given Apple’s profit a much-needed lift.

headline.main: Economic Reports for the Week of Oct. 28
headline.print_headline: Economic Reports for the Week of Oct. 28
